column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Puttalam to Matara via Colombo and Galle in the evening or night.
Winds will be South-westerly or variable in direction and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
Wind  speed  may  increase  up  to  (40-45)  kmph  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coasts
